{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2976583,"name":"Eric Bergquist","username":"kitare102","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/kitare102/{size}/212327_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-13T23:16:11.287Z","cooked":"

Hi all,

When I search "MKCad - " in the Other Documents tab when inserting something into a document, the results are filled with unofficial copies of the MKCad resources. Is there any way to filter so that the only results are official MKCad documents?

Eric

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2021-11-14T01:35:32.746Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":114,"readers_count":113,"score":97.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":397294,"topic_slug":"onshape-mkcad-search-filtering-resolved","display_username":"Eric Bergquist","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":23148,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Coach Eric, FRC 3100 Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/onshape-mkcad-search-filtering-resolved/397294/1","custom_user_title":"Coach Eric, FRC 3100 Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":2976585,"name":"Nick Aarestad","username":"cadandcookies","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/cadandcookies/{size}/158154_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-13T23:21:56.761Z","cooked":"

Use this link: Onshape

Descriptions aren’t copied in the unofficial copies.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":7,"updated_at":"2021-11-13T23:21:56.761Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":111,"readers_count":110,"score":107.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":397294,"topic_slug":"onshape-mkcad-search-filtering-resolved","display_username":"Nick Aarestad","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://cad.onshape.com/documents?nodeId=3&resourceType=filter&q=type:document%20name:%22MKCad%22%20description:%22Official%22","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Onshape","clicks":17}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":17187,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/onshape-mkcad-search-filtering-resolved/397294/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2976589,"name":"AllenGregoryIV","username":"AllenGregoryIV","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/allengregoryiv/{size}/65531_2.png","created_at":"2021-11-14T00:15:57.291Z","cooked":"

Then set all of those official MKCAD documents as a tag, so when you are looking for them to derive something, etc it’s easier.

If you just need to insert parts in an assembly the MKCAD app is the much faster/simpler option for most things.

The MKCad App Onshape
I’m happy to announce the official release of the MKCad onshape app. A huge thanks to my fellow developers @ACrazyChipmunk and @Chadfrom7226, to all of the alpha and beta testers, and the rest of the MKCad team. Everyone should now be able to use the app whether you were in the beta or not. I’ll be monitoring the backend closely for any stability issues and hope to have new features rolling out soon. Please continue to post any bugs as you find them. The current list of known issues and reque…

That post has the release details.

And Getting Started | Onshape4FRC has information on getting it setup plus links to great feature scripts.
